item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Don't quote me on this, because I'm working from information I've pieced together here and there, nothing authoritative.

But I'm going to guess beating it gets you 2 items, one for the current Kage, and 1 given randomly amongst the people who helped beat it. The more you helped, the greater your chances of getting it. If the Kage already has one, he can trade it though, meaning eventually everyone can theoretically get one, assuming the time frame is long enough.

My understanding is that once you get the Natural Research Facility and possibly some other upgrade, the Demon of the Sand will attack your Village occasionally. Your village needs to beat it and seal it in the form of an item that turns into a theme the next time you loop.

But really, there's only a handful of guys who can really answer this question. Maybe Evil Taxi or Heroic Fool.
